content: Is there a particular reason why Functor.congr_map (and Functor.congr_obj) are stated in terms of functors and not prefunctors? It would be helpful if they were, because then I could use this dot notation when working with pseudofunctors also. If there are no issues with this generalization, I could make a PR for this.
Made PR #12384 and it seems to not break anything
My guess: these lemmas were added before prefunctors were added to the library.
